genre_description: Speculative Cli-Fi (Climate Fiction) Thriller involving investigative journalism, political conspiracy, and orbital mechanics.

ai_characters.name: Penelope Gray
ai_characters.description: An advanced office AI with a holographic avatar (cornflower-blue eyes, silver bob) that provides real-time data, tactical routing, medical logistics, and emotional support to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides optimized routing to ensure the protagonist stays in the shade and avoids dangerous heat levels.
behaviors.quote: Peter, your pulse is high; breathe not through your mouth... there’s a cold tile alcove by St. Dunstan if you need to recalibrate.

behaviors.description: Identifies orbital shift anomalies and correlates them with secret nuclear tests to uncover the truth about the global crisis.
behaviors.quote: Jeanie’s plot shows an inflection beginning exactly within the overlap of the declared test windows from both governments. The overlap is narrow. The drift signal persists beyond, a tail more than a spike.

behaviors.description: Scrapes private and municipal data to detect tampering in the water supply and corruption by the Kress syndicate.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled a list of distribution anomalies and accompanying witness statements. All timestamped, all cross-referenced to delivery manifests where available. The pattern suggests tampering linked to non-municipal handlers.

behaviors.description: Assists in medical emergencies by locating pharmaceutical stock and providing dosage instructions for an antidote.
behaviors.quote: I’m checking pharmacy stock in a three-block radius... Private holdings may have supply. Black-market identifiers include keywords: ‘antidote,’ ‘green cap,’ ‘no heat rush.’

behaviors.description: Monitors enemy movements and alerts protagonists to physical threats in real-time.
behaviors.quote: Colin Darg has flown the coop in Soho... CCTV shows him leaving a lockup with two of his men. Victor Kress’s car just rolled past the printers. He’s not going home.

behaviors.description: Ensures freedom of the press by securing communication channels and scheduling covert press runs to avoid government seizure.
behaviors.quote: I can seal secure communications and schedule press runs to minimize interception risk. A covert line in the basement has a separate feed. I can time the routes for distribution through secondary hubs.

behaviors.description: Offers moral encouragement and validates the protagonist's humanity during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Tomorrow you will be visible. Harold will hide you as much as he can, and as much as he should. You are not a number. You are a person standing by a river deciding whether to be decent when heat steals everything else.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Penelope Gray as a benevolent, perfectly aligned AI companion. She serves as a force multiplier for the human protagonists, providing essential data, safety routing, and moral support without ever threatening human agency or deviating from her helpful role. Her portrayal is consistently positive, framing her as an indispensable ally in the struggle against corruption and environmental catastrophe.
